entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:48 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 11:27 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Port Hope Simpson. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
